dc_title_s: Plan of the redoubt and intrenchment on the heights of Charles Town, commonly called Bunker's Hill, opposite Boston, in New England, attacked and carried by his Majesty's troops, June 17, 1775.
dc_description_s: Map appears in the September 1st, 1775 issue of Gentleman's Magazine. Text accompanies map recto and verso.: Original version published [London] : [Gentleman's Magazine], [1775]; Scale approximately 1:1,080
